about_the_game:
※This game is currently under development. Since it has not been completed, various functions will be added or updated in the future.

What if things move in your workplace?
You are a part-time employee working at the counter.
Do not let live toys go out.


----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

◆ Game description
→ This game is a VR-only game and you need a Vive or Oculus Headset.

▶ At the counter, the game starts at the part-time employee and can not be moved.
Use your toy guns and objects to stop them from getting out.

▶ Throw or shoot 4 firearms and 10 or more items to stop the toys.

▶ The stage consists of three in total, the boss appeared in the last stage!

▶ It is not disturbing because it does not move. Children can do it easily.

▶ Achieve a high score and achieve your rank!

name: ToyShot VR

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 8.1 or later, Windows 10
  • Processor: CPU: Intel i5-4590, AMD FX 8350 equivalent or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1060 3GB, AMD Radeon RX 480 equivalent or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • VR Support: SteamVR or Oculus PC. Standing Only
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 8.1 or later, Windows 10
  • Processor: CPU: Intel i5-6600 or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1070 or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Casual shooting game that you can enjoy in VR lightly! Do not let live toys go out.
